topic: Benchmarking and Evaluation Papers

  entities:
    Andrés Villa|Person
    MERLIM|Benchmark
    Yuan Liu|Person
    MMBench|Benchmark
    Bohao Li|Person
    SEED-Bench|Benchmark

  proposition: Andrés Villa and colleagues introduced MERLIM, a multi-modal evaluation benchmark for large image-language models in arXiv preprint arXiv:2312.02219 in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Andrés Villa|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2023
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Andrés Villa|CREATED|MERLIM

  proposition: Yuan Liu and colleagues developed MMBench to assess multi-modal model capabilities in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Yuan Liu|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2023
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Yuan Liu|CREATED|MMBench

  proposition: Bohao Li and colleagues created SEED-Bench for benchmarking Multimodal Large Language Models in the IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Bohao Li|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2024
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Bohao Li|CREATED|SEED-Bench
    SEED-Bench|PRESENTED_AT|IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition

topic: Research Papers on Multimodal Models

  entities:

    TaskCLIP|Model
    Qirui Jiao|Person
    Peng Jin|Person

  proposition: Hanning Chen and colleagues proposed TaskCLIP for task-oriented object detection in arXiv preprint arXiv:2403.08108 in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Hanning Chen|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2024
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Hanning Chen|PROPOSED|TaskCLIP

  proposition: Qirui Jiao and colleagues studied enhancing multimodal large language models with vision detection models in arXiv preprint arXiv:2401.17981 in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Qirui Jiao|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2024

  proposition: Peng Jin and colleagues developed Chat-UniVi for unified visual representation in large language models in the IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Peng Jin|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2024
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Peng Jin|DEVELOPED|Chat-UniVi
    Chat-UniVi|PRESENTED_AT|IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition

  proposition: Gongwei Chen and colleagues introduced LION, empowering multimodal large language models with dual-level visual knowledge in the IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Gongwei Chen|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2024
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Gongwei Chen|INTRODUCED|LION
    LION|PRESENTED_AT|IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition

  proposition: Jusung Lee and colleagues worked on visual question answering instruction for domain-specific visual multitasks in arXiv preprint arXiv:2402.08360 in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Jusung Lee|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2024

  proposition: Zongwei Wu and colleagues developed a single-model approach for video object tracking in the IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Zongwei Wu|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2024

  proposition: Niki Maria Foteinopoulou and Ioannis Patras created EmoCLIP for zero-shot video facial expression recognition in the 2024 IEEE International Conference on Automatic Face and Gesture Recognition.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Niki Maria Foteinopoulou|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2024
    Ioannis Patras|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2024

  proposition: Yao Feng and colleagues developed ChatPose for discussing 3D human pose in the IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Yao Feng|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2024
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Yao Feng|DEVELOPED|ChatPose
